Design-01.Description: Design Style 01 is a Solid graphic stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'CUSTOM TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe allowing the vehicle surface to show through, or it can be an alternate color than the main stripe.

Design-02.Description: Design Style 02 is a Solid stripe with outer pinstripes decal style. The outer pinstripe accent (red in image) can be the same, or alternate color to the main stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'CUSTOM TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe, or it can be an alternate color than the main stripe.

Design-03.Description: Design Style 03 is a Solid stripe with open mid section where custom text or logo can be added. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'CUSTOM TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added to the mid section and either be the same color as the main stripe, or it can be an alternate color both.

Design-04.Description: Design Style 04 is a Strobe / Striped design with thicker stripes at the top, narrow stripes at the bottom. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'CUSTOM / TEXT LOGO' in image) can be added with a border cut between it and the main stripe in the same color, or can be an alternate color than the main stripe.

Design-05.Description: Design Style 05 is a Solid stripe with inner tapered accent. The inner accent (red in image) can be cut away to allow the vehicle surface to show through, or an alternate color to the main stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'CUSTOM TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe, or it can be the same color as the accent or an alternate color entirely.
